page.title: 12HOMELIFE.A DAY IN MY LIFE.
page.content: My name is Sarah Anderson I live in a small village called Chop Gate,I was going camping with my patrol of Girl Guides.I woke up on Wednesday May 29th at a quarter to 8 with a feeling of excitement inside me .I got up and went downstairs to have my breakfast, we had B&B's for the night so I had to be quiet.After breakfast I went outside to do my bedding roll then we set off,on our way to Kirby we picked the Birnies up.There was seven of us alltogether.First of all Heather and I put the toilet tent up.After all that we had our packed lunches then we put the wash and store tents up then we decided what to do next.We set off towards the river in our bathing suits when we got there only 4 people dared go in.When we got back we had corned beef hash & angel delight for dinner,then bedtime.
